cardContent.bloodPressureMessage: System analysis of patient's blood pressure data over the past 3 days shows sustained high systolic pressure
cardContent.missedMedicationMessage: System detected decreased medication adherence over the past 3 days, with 2 consecutive days of no medication records
cardContent.glucoseImprovementMessage: System analysis of patient's glucose data over the past 3 days shows average of 8.00mmol/L with declining trend
cardContent.patientInactivityMessage: System detected abnormal data upload activity over the past 3 days, only 1 record
cardContent.heartRateMessage: System analysis of patient's heart rate data over 3 days shows 110bpm during exercise is within normal range
cardContent.medicationSideEffectMessage: System detected patient's symptom reports over the past 3 days, found mild discomfort after medication
cardContent.newPatientEvaluationMessage: New patient {{name}} ({{age}} years old) has joined the system, recommend initial health assessment and personalized health management plan
cardContent.highRiskPatientMessage: New patient {{name}} is assessed as high risk level, recommend immediate detailed treatment and monitoring plan
cardContent.mediumRiskPatientMessage: New patient {{name}} is assessed as medium risk level, recommend regular follow-up and health monitoring
cardContent.elderlyPatientMessage: New patient {{name}} is {{age}} years old, belongs to elderly patient group, recommend enhanced health monitoring and preventive care
cardContent.hypertensionMessage: New patient {{name}} has hypertension, recommend regular blood pressure monitoring and treatment plan
cardContent.diabetesMessage: New patient {{name}} has diabetes, recommend glucose monitoring and medication plan
cardContent.heartDiseaseMessage: New patient {{name}} has heart disease, need special attention to cardiovascular health
cardContent.blood_pressure_message: System analysis of patient's blood pressure data over the past 3 days shows sustained high systolic pressure
cardContent.missed_medication_message: System detected decreased medication adherence over the past 3 days, with 2 consecutive days of no medication records
cardContent.glucose_improvement_message: System analysis of patient's glucose data over the past 3 days shows average of 8.00mmol/L with declining trend
cardContent.patient_inactivity_message: System detected abnormal data upload activity over the past 3 days, only 1 record
cardContent.heart_rate_message: System analysis of patient's heart rate data over 3 days shows 110bpm during exercise is within normal range
cardContent.medication_side_effect_message: System detected patient's symptom reports over the past 3 days, found mild discomfort after medication
